name: Dogs and my kids - free game
name_original: Dogs and my kids - free game
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8).

This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:

In this game butterflies carrying targets. Your child must shoot the targets to release butterflies and help them fly. Maximum score's necessary to go to the next level. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:

In this game your child will lead a rocket. To win it's necessary to collect a maximum point in going as high as possible. For this, your child must avoid the obstacles and collect cans of fuel. In two player mode, the winner is the one who can climb as high as possible. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of dogs.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of dogs to release.

The following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
